project.name: superpowers
project.tagline: Enforce Best Practices for AI Coding Agents
project.description: Don't let AI be lazy. Superpowers provides 14 composable skills that enforce systematic design, TDD development, and code review for AI agents, ensuring production-quality delivery every time. Supports Claude Code, OpenCode, and Codex platforms.

features.title: Why Choose Superpowers?
features.subtitle: Inject Software Engineering Discipline into AI Coding Agents

list.title: üéØ Enforce Design Dialogue
list.desc: Before AI writes the first line of code, enforce requirement clarification and architecture design to avoid rework caused by over-rationalization.

list.title: üß™ TDD Discipline Enforcement
list.desc: No code without tests, enforcing the RED-GREEN-REFACTOR cycle to ensure test coverage and code maintainability.

list.title: üîç Systematic Debugging
list.desc: Four-stage debugging workflow (Observe ‚Üí Hypothesize ‚Üí Verify ‚Üí Fix), rejecting blind guesses and random fixes.

list.title: üë• Sub-Agent Driven Development
list.desc: Specialized division of labor for rapid iteration. Utilize multiple sub-agents to execute tasks in parallel, with automatic code review for every step.

list.title: üîÄ Git Worktree Isolation
list.desc: Create isolated environments for each feature, keeping the main branch clean and enabling conflict-free parallel development.

list.title: ‚ö° Concurrent Agent Dispatch
list.desc: When facing multiple independent tasks, dispatch multiple sub-agents in parallel to significantly improve development efficiency.

list.title: üìã Code Review Workflow
list.desc: Automatically trigger code review after each task completion, maintaining code quality and catching issues early.

list.title: üõ° Evidence-First Verification
list.desc: Require genuine verification before claiming completion (passing tests, successful builds, updated docs), eliminating half-finished deliveries.

list.title: üîå Three Platform Support
list.desc: Seamless integration with Claude Code, OpenCode, and Codex AI coding platforms, with automatic skill loading.

list.title: ‚ú® Extensible Skill System
list.desc: Write custom skills and create specialized workflows. Skills are stored as files, making them easy to version control and share.
